sentence.Network_en: Repentance skindeep . Pray at an altar . Hail Mary and Holy Mary.
sentence.Network_cn: 她跪在祭坛前祷告,念着《万福玛利亚》和《至圣玛利亚》.

PerfectNetExp.abs: skindamage 皮肤营养障碍, skindeep 深层表皮, skindamage 表皮损害

list.abs: Beauty is but skindeep外表美是肤浅短暂的 Beauty is in the eye of the beholder观者觉得美就是美 Beggars can’t be choosers饥不择食 A beggar’s purse.
